description: Two large, hairy prehistoric mammals face each other, one holding a small, wild-haired human male in its trunk, enclosed in a spherical sac. The mammals have suspicious expressions, while the human appears startled. The humor arises from the absurd sight of a giant creature treating a human as a contained object and the implication that the human is the source of an unpleasant odor being investigated by the other mammal. The interaction highlights a surreal role reversal where the typically dominant human is rendered helpless and insignificant.
caption: “Well, what the? ... I thought I smelled something.”
